All Products

Retired Red Hat Enterprise Linux Rolling Application Streams

Overview

The table below contains the retired Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 and 9 Rolling Application Streams. For information on the currently supported Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 and 9 Rolling Application Streams, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Application Streams Life Cycle page.

  • RHEL 9 Retired Rolling Application Streams
  • RHEL 8 Retired Rolling Application Streams

RHEL 9 Retired Rolling Application Streams

Rolling Application Stream Product Version Release Date Maintenance Support Ended
LLVM 13.0.1 May 2022 Nov 2022
Go 1.17.7 May 2022 Jun 2022
Go 1.17.12 Jun 2022 Nov 2022
Go 1.18.4 Nov 2022 Jan 2023
Rust 1.58.1 May 2022 Nov 2022
The above-mentioned tools are available for the following architectures: AMD and Intel 64-bit architectures, the 64-bit ARM architecture, IBM Power Systems, Little Endian, and 64-bit IBM Z.

RHEL 8 Retired Rolling Application Streams

Rolling Application Stream Product Version Release Date Maintenance Support Ended
LLVM 7.0.1 May 2019 Nov 2019
LLVM 8.0.1 Nov 2019 May 2020
LLVM 9.0.1 May 2020 Nov 2020
LLVM 10.0.1 Nov 2020 May 2021
LLVM 11.0.0 May 2021 Nov 2021
LLVM 12.0.1 Nov 2021 May 2022
LLVM 13.0.1 May 2022 Nov 2022
Go 1.11.5 May 2019 Jul 2019
Go 1.11.6 Jul 2019 Sep 2020
Go 1.11.13 Sep 2019 Nov 2020
Go 1.12.8 Nov 2019 Feb 2020
Go 1.12.12 Feb 2019 May 2020
Go 1.13.4 May 2020 Sep 2020
Go 1.13.15 Sep 2020 Nov 2020
Go 1.14.7 Nov 2020 Dec 2020
Go 1.14.12 Dec 2020 May 2021
Go 1.15.7 May 2021 Jun 2021
Go 1.15.13 Jun 2021 Aug 2021
Go 1.15.14 Aug 2021 Nov 2021
Go 1.16.7 Nov 2021 Dec 2021
Go 1.16.12 Dec 2021 May 2022
Go 1.17.7 May 2022 Jun 2022
Go 1.17.10 Jun 2022 Aug 2022
Go 1.17.12 Aug 2022 Nov 2022
Go 1.18.4 Nov 2022 Jan 2023
Rust 1.31.0 May 2019 Jul 2019
Rust 1.35.0 Jul 2019 Nov 2019
Rust 1.37.0 Nov 2019 Feb 2020
Rust 1.39.0 Feb 2019 May 2020
Rust 1.41.1 May 2020 Jul 2020
Rust 1.43.1 Jul 2020 Nov 2020
Rust 1.45.2 Nov 2020 Feb 2021
Rust 1.47.0 Feb 2021 May 2021
Rust 1.49.0 May 2021 Aug 2021
Rust 1.52.1 Aug 2021 Nov 2021
Rust 1.54.0 Nov 2021 May 2022
Rust 1.58.1 May 2022 Nov 2022
The above-mentioned tools are available for the following architectures: AMD and Intel 64-bit architectures, the 64-bit ARM architecture, IBM Power Systems, Little Endian, and 64-bit IBM Z.
